List of research articles citing EntropyHub

----

* `Altered Entropy Modulation in Bipolar Disorder: EEG Entropy Measures During Steady-State Auditory Entrainment Exposure <https://papers.ssrn.com/sol3/papers.cfm?abstract_id=5357085>`_
    | W Creel, GE DeChance, C Brenner, R Hartman
    | *SSRN*

    | *Physiological Reports*

    | *Expert Systems with Applications*

* `Assessing the chaos strength of Taylor approximations of the sine chaotic map <https://link.springer.com/article/10.1007/s11071-022-07929-y>`_     
    | Ioannis Kafetzis, Lazaros Moysis, Christos Volos          
    | *Nonlinear Dynamics*

* `Utility of sample entropy from intraoperative cerebral NIRS oximetry data in the diagnosis of postoperative cognitive improvement <https://doi.org/10.3389/fphys.2022.965768>`_
    | Xiaoxiao Wang, Ran Huo, Wanzhong Yuan, Huishu Yuan, Tao Wang, Nan Li     
    | *Frontiers in Physiology*

* `Entropy Measures of Electroencephalograms towards the Diagnosis of Psychogenic Non-Epileptic Seizures <https://www.mdpi.com/1099-4300/24/10/1348/pdf>`_
    | Chloe Hinchliffe, Mahinda Yogarajah, Samia Elkommos, Hongying Tang, Daniel Abasolo          
    | *Entropy (MDPI)*

* `Application of Two-Dimensional Entropy Measures to Detect the Radiographic Signs of Tooth Resorption and Hypercementosis in an Equine Model <https://www.mdpi.com/2227-9059/10/11/2914>`_
    | Kamil Górski, Marta Borowska, Elżbieta Stefanik, Izabela Polkowska, Bernard Turek, Andrzej Bereznowski, Małgorzata Domino 
    | *Biomedicines (MDPI)*

* `Application of the Two-Dimensional Entropy Measures in the Infrared Thermography-Based Detection of Rider: Horse Bodyweight Ratio in Horseback Riding <https://www.mdpi.com/1424-8220/22/16/6052>`_
    | Małgorzata Domino, Marta Borowska, Łukasz Zdrojkowski, Tomasz Jasiński, Urszula Sikorska, Michał Skibniewski, Małgorzata Maśko
    | *Sensors (MDPI)*

* `What can Entropy Metrics Tell Us About Types of Fixations during Video Viewing? <https://digital.library.txstate.edu/handle/10877/16142>`_
    | K Melnyk, L Friedman, O Komogortsev 
    | *Texas State Digital Library*

* `Dynamical Complexity Response in Traveling Ionospheric Disturbances Across Eastern Africa Sector During Geomagnetic Storms Using Neural Network Entropy <https://doi.org/10.1029/2022ja030630>`_
    | I. A. Oludehinwa, A. Velichko, B. O. Ogunsua, O. I. Olusola, O. O. Odeyemi, A. N. Njah, O. T. Ologun     
    | *Journal of Geophysical Research Space Physics*

* `A Novel Acoustic Method for Cavitation Identification of Propeller <https://doi.org/10.3390/jmse10091225>`_
    | Yang Li, Lilin Cui     
    | *Journal of Marine Science and Engineering*
    
* `Pressure Injury Link to Entropy of Abdominal Temperature <https://doi.org/10.3390/e24081127>`_
    | Nikhil Padhye, Denise Rios, Vaunette Fay, Sandra K Hanneman
    | *Entropy (MDPI)*
    
* `Classification of Electroencephalograms during Mathematical Calculations Using Deep Learning <https://doi.org/10.1109/iri54793.2022.00016>`_
    | Umang Goenka, Param Patil, Kush Gosalia, Aaryan Jagetia
    | *IEEE 23rd International Conference on Information Reuse and Integration for Data Science (IRI)* , `arXiv <https://doi.org/10.48550/arxiv.2209.00627>`_

* `The Structure of Chaos: An Empirical Comparison of Fractal Physiology Complexity Indices Using NeuroKit2 <https://doi.org/10.3390/e24081036>`_
    | Dominique Makowski, An Shu Te, Tam Pham, Zen Juen Lau, S. H. Annabel Chen
    | *Entropy (MDPI)*

* `Novel techniques for improvement the NNetEn entropy calculation for short and noisy time series <https://arxiv.org/abs/2202.12703>`_    
    | Hanif Heidari, Andrei Velichko
    | *arXiv*

* `Privacy-preserving human mobility and activity modelling <https://spiral.imperial.ac.uk/handle/10044/1/101456>`_
    | Yuting Zhan
    | *Imperial College London Repository*
